dublin_core.dcvalue: Dermatology is a branch of medicine that benefits from the use of photography to assist in diagnosis and teaching through clinical discussion of the physical signs of a disease and thereafter for the monitoring of the condition throughout treatment This paper describes the development of a dedicated medical photography service in the Welsh Institute of Dermatology at the University Hospital of Wales Cardiff and Vale NHS Trust As a consequence a close working relationship has developed between the dermatologists and the photographers leading to some interesting new approaches in the use of photography to enhance patient care
Journal of visual communication in medicine
